name: 12Games12Weeks - 8 - JRPG
description:
JRPG Game for my 12 Games in 12 Weeks Challenge. Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks.

Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

Controls:

  • Keyboard/mouse:
    • WASD or Arrow keys to move
    • Space to Select Menu options
  • X-box (compatible) controller
    • Left Stick to move
    • A Menu select
